subdisciplines.name: Neural Systems and Circuits
subdisciplines.description: The study of the neural circuits underlying behavior and cognition.

subdisciplines.name: Computational Neuroscience
subdisciplines.description: The study of the information processing algorithms and models that underlie neural systems.

subdisciplines.name: Neurophysiology
subdisciplines.description: The study of the electrical properties of neurons and their functions within neural circuits.

subdisciplines.name: Neuroanatomy
subdisciplines.description: The study of the structure and organization of the nervous system, including the brain and spinal cord.

subdisciplines.name: Neuroimaging
subdisciplines.description: The use of advanced imaging techniques to visualize the structure and function of the human brain.
